mapper.insert: INSERT INTO taskReviewProcess( taskAssignmentId, role, file, reviewOpinion, reviewPassedFlag, reviewButtonShowFlag, rejectLevel, createTime, updateTime, orderNum, deltag) VALUES ( #{taskAssignmentId}, #{role}, #{file}, #{reviewOpinion}, #{reviewPassedFlag}, #{reviewButtonShowFlag}, #{rejectLevel}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{orderNum}, #{deltag})
